verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> [or] Psalm לִבְנֵ֫י <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> of Korah לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> to the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> upon מָחֲלַ֣ת <WH4257> upon Mahalath לְעַנּ֑וֹת <WH6031> Leannoth מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> Maschil לְהֵימָ֥ן <WH1968> of Heman הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <WH250> the Ezrahite יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> of my salvation יוֹם־ <WH3117> day צָעַ֖קְתִּי <WH6817> I have cried בַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> [and] night נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> before
תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> come לְ֭פָנֶיךָ <WH6440> before תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> Let my prayer הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> thee incline אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <WH241> thine ear לְרִנָּתִֽי׃ <WH7440> unto my cry

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָֽׂבְעָ֣ה <WH7646> is full בְרָע֣וֹת <WH7451> of troubles נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> For my soul וְחַיַּ֗י <WH2416> and my life לִשְׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> unto the grave הִגִּֽיעוּ׃ <WH5060> draweth nigh

נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי <WH2803> I am counted עִם־ <WH5973> among י֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down ב֑וֹר <WH953> into the pit הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <WH1961> have כְּגֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> I am as a man אֵֽין־ <WH369> without אֱיָֽל׃ <WH353> [that hath] no strength

בַּמֵּתִ֗ים <WH4191> among the dead חָ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH2670> Free כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> Like חֲלָלִ֨ים ׀ <WH2491> like the slain שֹׁ֥כְבֵי <WH7901> that lie קֶ֗בֶר <WH6913> in the grave אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whom לֹ֣א <WH3808> no זְכַרְתָּ֣ם <WH2142> whom thou rememberest ע֑וֹד <WH5750> more וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> from מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> from thy hand נִגְזָֽרוּ׃ <WH1504> no more and they are cut off
שַׁ֭תַּנִי <WH7896> Thou hast laid בְּב֣וֹר <WH953> pit תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת <WH8482> me in the lowest בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <WH4285> in darkness בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH4688> in the deeps

עָ֭לַי <WH5921> and סָמְכָ֣ה <WH5564> lieth hard חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2534> Thy wrath וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ <WH4867> [me] with all thy waves עִנִּ֥יתָ <WH6031> upon me and thou hast afflicted סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ <WH7368> far מְיֻדָּעַ֗י <WH3045> mine acquaintance מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> at שַׁתַּ֣נִי <WH7896> from me thou hast made תוֹעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> me an abomination לָ֑מוֹ כָּ֝לֻ֗א <WH3607> unto them [I am] shut up וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and cannot אֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> and I cannot come forth

עֵינִ֥י <WH5869> Mine eye דָאֲבָ֗ה <WH1669> mourneth מִנִּ֫י <WH4480> because עֹ֥נִי <WH6040> by reason of affliction קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> I have called יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every י֑וֹם <WH3117> daily שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי <WH7849> upon thee I have stretched out אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> out כַפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> my hands

הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים <WH4191> to the dead תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Wilt thou shew פֶּ֑לֶא <WH6382> wonders אִם־ <WH518> lo רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <WH7496> ? shall the dead יָק֤וּמוּ ׀ <WH6965> arise יוֹד֬וּךָ <WH3034> [and] praise סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> thee? Selah
הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר <WH5608> be declared בַּקֶּ֣בֶר <WH6913> the grave חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> Shall thy lovingkindness אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> your faithfulness בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <WH11> destruction
הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> be known בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> dark פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ <WH6382> Shall thy wonders וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> justice בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land נְשִׁיָּֽה׃ <WH5388> forgetfulness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי <WH7768> But unto thee have I cried וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> and in the morning תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> shall my prayer תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃ <WH6923> prevent
לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> why יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> LORD תִּזְנַ֣ח <WH2186> why castest thou off נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> any תַּסְתִּ֖יר <WH5641> be absent פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> thou thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

עָ֘נִ֤י <WH6041> I [am] afflicted אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וְגֹוֵ֣עַ <WH1478> and ready to die מִנֹּ֑עַר <WH5290> from [my] youth נָשָׂ֖אתִי <WH5375> up [while] I suffer אֵמֶ֣יךָ <WH367> thy terrors אָפֽוּנָה׃ <WH6323> I am distracted
עָ֭לַי <WH5921> over עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> goeth over חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ <WH2740> Thy fierce wrath בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ <WH1161> me thy terrors צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃ <WH6789> have cut me off

סַבּ֣וּנִי <WH5437> They came round about כַ֭מַּיִם <WH4325> like water כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> me daily הִקִּ֖יפוּ <WH5362> they compassed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> me about together

הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ <WH7368> hast thou put far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> at אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> Lover וָרֵ֑עַ <WH7453> and friend מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י <WH3045> from me [and] mine acquaintance מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃ <WH4285> into darkness
